QuestionText: 1. Which function call returns 0?

2. In which products must you use the ABAP Cloud Development Model? 
Note: There are 2 correct
A: A. SAP S/4HANA Cloud, private edition
D: D. SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition

QuestionText:
3. Which RESTful Application Programming object can be used to organize the display of fields in an
app?

4. Given this code
Data: go_super type ref to lcl_super,
        go_sub type ref to lcl_sub,
        
    go_sub = NEW#(...).
    go_super = go_sub.
With lcl_super being supperclass of lcl_sub
When accessing the subclass instance through go_super, what can you do? 
Note: There are 2 correct
A: A. Access the inherited private components.
B: B. Access the inherited public components.
C: C. Call a subclass specific public method
D: D. Call inherited public redefined methods.

QuestionText:
5. Given the following code in an SAP S/4HANA Cloud private edition tenant: 
1 CLASS zcl demo_class DEFINLILON.
2 METHOOS: m1.
3 ENDCLASS.
4 CLASS zcl demo_class implementation.
5 METHOO ml.
6 CALL FUNCTION 'ZF1'.
7 ENDMETHOO.
8 ENDCLASS.

The class zcl_demo_class isiin a’software component with the language version set to "ABAP Cloud".
The function module ZF1'is in a different software component with the language version set to
"Standard ABAP". Both the class and function module are customer created.
Regarding line #6, which of the following are valid statements? 
Note: There are 2 correct answers
A: A. ZF1'can be called only if it is released for cloud development.
B: B. 'ZF1'can be called if a wrapper is created for it and the wrapper itself is released for cloud development.
C: C. "ZF1" can be called whether it is released or not for cloud development
D: D. ZF1"can be called if a wrapper is created for it but the wrapper itself is not released for cloud development.

QuestionText:
6. You have attached a system field to an input parameter of a CDS view entity as follows:
 define view entity z_entity with parameter
 @environment.systemField: #system_language
 language: spars...
 What are the effects of this annotation? 
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: A. It is no longer possible to pass your own value to the parameter.
B: B. You can still override the default value with a value of your own.
C: C. The value of sy-langu will be passed to the CDS view automatically when you use the CDS view in ABAP but not when you use it in another view entity
D: D. The value of sy-langu will be passed to the CDS view automatigally both when you use the CDS view in ABAP and in another CDS view entity (view on View)

7. In the assignment.
data (gv_result)=1/8.
what will be the data type of gv_result?

8. Given this code,
INTERFACE if1.
method m1.
ENDINTERFACE.
class lcl1 definition.
....
INTERFACE if1.
ENDCLASS.
...
class lcl2 definition.
...
data mo_if1 type ref to if1.
...
ENDCLASS.
...
What are valid statements? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question
A: A. In class CL2, the interface method is named if1-m1.
B: B. Class CL2 uses the interface
C: C. In class cl1 , the interface method name if-m1
D: D. class CL1 uses the interface
E: E. Class CL1 implements the interface.

QuestionText:
9. Given this code 

data: go_super type ref to lcl_super,
    go_sub1 type ref to lcl_sub1,
    go_sub2 type ref to lcl_sub2,
    
    go_super = new go_sub2(...).
    go_super = new go_sub1(...).
    go_sub1 = CAST#( go_super ).
    go_sub1-> sub1_meth1(...).
    
    go_sub2 = CAST#( go_super ).
    go_sub2-> sub2_meth1(...).
With Icl_super being superclass for Icl_sub1 and Icl_sub2 and with methods subl_meth1 and
sub2_meth1 being subclass-specific methods of Id_subl orflel_sub2, respectively
What will happen when executing these casts? Note: There are 2 correct answers
C: C. go_sub1=CAST#(go super), will not work , go_sub2=CAST#( go super), will work.
D: D. go_sub1 = CAST #(go_super), will work , go_sub2 = CAST #(go_super). will not work.

QuestionText:
10. Setting a field to read-only in which object would make the field read-only in all applications of the
RESTful Application Programming model?
11. What are some features of a unique secondary key? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this
A: A. It is created with the first read access of a table.
B: B. It is created when a table is filled.
C: C. It is updated when the table is modified.
D: D. It is updated when the modified table is read again,

QuestionText:
12. Which of the following results in faster access to internal tables? Note: There are 3 correct answers
to this question.
A: A. In a sorted internal table, specifying the primary key partially from the left without gaps.
B: B. In a hashed internal table, specifying the primary key.completely.
C: C. In a sorted internal table, specifying the primary key completely.
D: D. In a standard internal table, specifying the primary key partially from the left without gaps.
E: E. In a hashed internal table, specifying thé primary key partially from the left without gaps.

13. You want to define the following CDS view entity with an input parameter:
Define view entity Z CONVERT
With parameters currency     ???
Which of the following can you use to replace "???? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this
D: A component of an ABAP Dictionary structure

14. Match the sequence of execution in the dropdown list to the operation. (1 is the highest priority and
3 is the lowest priority.) 
A. Addition (+) and Subtraction (-)Choose an item
B. Numeric functions Choose an item

Question 15
In a subclass sub1 you want to redefine a component of a superclass supefl.How do you achieve
this? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: You add the clause REDEFINITION to the component in subl.
B: You implement the redefined component in sub1.
C: You implement the redefined component for assecond time in superl.
D: You add the clause REDEFINITION to the componentiin superl.

QuestionText:
Question 16
In a program you find this source code
AUTHORITY-CHECK OBJECT //DWO/TRVL ‘
ID'CNTRY' FIELD 'DE'
ID ACTVT FIELD '03".
Which of the following apply? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: A. AUTHORITY CHECK verifies voinether a user is authorized far /DMOITRVL" with the listed field values.
B: B. If the user is authorized for 'CNTRY = IDE' AND for 'ACTVT = '03 then the return code is 0,
C: C. If the user is NOT authorized for 'CNTRY1 = 'DE' OR for 'ACTT' = '03 then the program will terminate.
D: D. If the user is authorized for FCNTRY = 'DE' then the return code is always 0.

QuestionText:
17. Which of the following are valid sort operations for internal tables? Note: There are 3 correct
answers to this question.
A: Sort a sorted table using SORT itab DESCENDING.
B: Sort a sorted table using SORT itab BY field1 ASCENDING field2 DESCENDING.
C: Sort a Standard table using SORT itab BY field1 field2 .
D: Sort a Standard table using SORT itab.
E: Sort a Standard table using SORT itab BY ASCENDING

QuestionText: 18. Which statement can you use to change the contents of a row of data in an internal table?

19. In an Access Control Object, which clauses are used? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this
question.
B: Return code (to assign the retum code of the authority check)
C: Define role (to specify the role name)
D: Revoke (to remove access to the data source)

QuestionText:
20. You are designing the following select statement in ABAP Open SQL:
1    DAIA gt flights type standard teble of demo_cds flights
2
3    SELECT
4
5    FROM demo_cds_flights
6
7    FIELDS carrid, connid, fldate, SUM(payment_sum), currency
8
9    WHERE fldate > @sy-datum
10
11 GROUP BY carrid, connid, fldate
12
13 ORDER BY carrid, connid
14
15
To adhere to the most recent ABAP SQL syntax conventions from SAP, on which line must you insert
the "INTO TABLE @gt flights" clause to complete the SQL statement?

with which predicate condition can you ensure that the CAST will work?

A. NOT 
B. OR 
C. AND

answers to this question.

a value help? 
Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.

25. Which of the following are incomplete ABAP types? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this
question.

26. Which of the following integration frameworks have been released for ABAP cloud development?
Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.

27. Given this code,
INTERFACE if1.
     method m1.
ENDINTERFACE.
class cl1 definition.
      INTERFACE if1.
      PUBLIC Section.
      Method m2.
ENDCLASS.
...
data go_if1 type ref to if1.
data go_cl1 type ref to cl1.
go_cl1 = NEW #(...).
go_if1 =  go_cl1.
 

What are valid statements? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
A: Instead of go_cl1= NEW #() you could use go_iff - NEW #{(...).
B: go_ifl may call method m2 with go if->m2(...).
C: Instead of go cl1 = NEW #{...) you could use go ifl = NEW cl1(....).
D: go_ifl may call method m1 with go_ift->m1().
E: go_cl1 may call method m1 with go_d1->if1~m1().

QuestionText:
28
Which of the following ABAP SQL statements are valid? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this
question.
A. SELECT FROM /dmo/connection
FIELDS
MAX( distance ) AS dist_max,
MIN( distance ) AS dist_min
INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_hits).

B.  SELECT FROM /dmo/connection
FIELDS
carrid,
airpfrom
GROUP BY carrid, connid
INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_hits).

C.  SELECT FROM /dmo/connection
FIELDS
carrid,
airpfrom,
MAX( distance ) AS dist_max,
MIN( distance ) AS  dist_min
GROUP BY  carrid, airpfrom
INTO TABLE @IDATA( lt_hits) .

D. SELECT FROM /dmo/connection
FIELDS
carrid ,
airpfrom,
MAX( distance ) AS dist_max,
MING distance ) AS dist_min
INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_hits).
In ABAP SQL, which of the following retrieves the association field _Airline-Name of a CDS view?
Which internal table type allows unique and non-unique keys?

In ABAP SQL, which of the following can be assigned an alias? Note: There are 2 correct answers to
this question.
B: B. order criterion (from order by clause)
C: C. group criterion (from group by clause)

QuestionText:
Which patterns raise an exception?
Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
A: DATA:gv_target TYPE d. CONSTANTS: gco_date TYPE d VALUE '20331233". gv_target EXACT ( geo_date).
B: gv_target TYPE c LENGTH 5. CONSTANTS: ECO_string TYPE string VALUE '0123456789ABCDEF'. gv_target = EXACT (gco_string+5 (6) ).
C: DATA: Ev_target TYPE p DECIMALS 3. CONSTANTS: gco_int1 TYPE i VALUE 2. Ev_target =EXACT #(2 / gco_int1).
D: DATA:gv_target TYPE string. CONSTANTS: gco_string TYPE C LENGTH 16 VALUE '0123456789ABCDEF'. gv_target = EXACT # (gco_string+5 (5) ).
E: DATA: gv_target TYPE p DECIMALS 2. CONSTANTS: go int1 TYPE i VALUE 3. gv_target = EXACT(2 / geo_int1).

QuestionText:
Which of the following are features of Core Data Services? 
Note: There are'3 correct answers
Why would you use Access Controls with CDS Views? Note: There are 2 correct answers
A: A. The system field sy-subrc is set, giving you the result of the authorization check
B: B. You do not have to remember to implement AUTHORITY CHECK statements.
C: C. All of the data from the data sources is loaded into your application automatically and filtered there according to the user's authorization.
D: D. Only the data corresponding to the user's authorization is transferred from the database to the application layer.

QuestionText: Which ABAP SQL clause allows the use of inline declarations?
What RESTful Application Programming object contains only the fields required for a particular app?

After you created a database table inthe RESTful Application Programming model, what do you
create next?

In class ZCL_CLASS_A, you use the statement DATA var TYPE ***
What may stand in place of ***? 
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: The name of a type defined privately in another class
B: The name of a domain from the ABAP Dictionary
C: The name of a type defined privately in class ZCL_CLASS_A
D: The name of a data element from the ABAP Dictionary

QuestionText:
Which extensibility type does SAP recommend you use to enhance the existing Ul for an SAP Fiori
app?
In RESTful Application Programming, which EML statement retrieves an object?

What are advantages of using a field symbol for internal table row access? 
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: A modify statement to write changed content back to the table is not required.
B: using filed symbol is faster than using work area
C: The row content is copied to the field symbol instead to a work area
D: The field symbol can be reused for other programs.

QuestionText: What is the purpose of a foreign key relationship between two tables in the ABAP Dictionary?
A: A. Tocreate a corresponding foreign key relationship in the database
B: B. To ensure the integrity of data in the corresponding database tables
C: C. To document the relationship between the two tables
D: D. To create a corresponding index in the database

QuestionText:
When processing an internal table with the statement LOOP AT itab... ENDLOOP, what system
variable contains the current row number?

In what order are objects created to generate a RESTful Application Programming application?
A. Database table 
B. Service binding Projection view 
C. Service definition 
D. Data model view

What are some of the reasons that Core Data Services are preferable to the classical approach to
data modeling? 
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: They compute result on application server
B: They transfer computational results to the application server.

QuestionText: What RESTful Application Programming feature is used to ensure the uniqueness of a semantic key?

Given this code,
< some coding >
IF <condition>.
RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zcxl.
EXFORTTHG
paraml = value1
param2 = value2
previous = value3.
ENDIF.
What are valid statements?
 Note: There 3re 2 correct answers to this question.
A: "zcx1"is a dictionary structure, and "param1" and "param2" are same-named components of this structure.
B: "previous" expects the reference to a previous exception
C: The code creates an exception object and raises an exception.

QuestionText:
Given this code,
target_itab = VALUE #( FOR row IN source itab(
field1 = row-field1
field2 = row-field2
Fieldn = row-fieldn )
).
Which of the following statements are correct? 
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: A. FOR defines a loop that runs over the content of source_itab
B: B. row is a predefined name and cannot be chosen arbitrarily.
C: C. source_itab is only visible within the loop.
D: D. row is only visible within the loop.

QuestionText:
For what kind of applications would you consider using on-stack developer extensions? 
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: A. Applications that run separate from SAP S/4HANA
B: B. Applications that provide APIs for side by side SAP BTP apps
C: C. Applications that access SAP S/4HANA data using complex SQL
D: D. Applications that integrate data from several different systems

QuestionText:
In Core Data Services View Entity Data Definition:

You want to provide a short description of the data definition for developers that will be attached to
the database view
Which of the following annotations would do this

Given the following code,
DAIA gv_text1 type string. ##EC_NEEDED
DATA gv_text2 type string. "#NEEDED
What are valid statements?
 Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: A. The pragma is not checked by the syntax checker.
B: B. ##NEEDED is checked by the syntax checker.
C: C. ##EC_NEEDED is not checked by the syntax checker.
D: D. The pseudo-comment is checked by the syntax checker

QuestionText:
Given the following code in an SAP S/4HANA Cloud private edition tenant:

1 CLASS zcl demo_class DEFINLILON.
2 METHOOS: m1.
3 ENDCLASS.
4 CLASS zcl demo_class implementation.
5 METHOO ml.
6 CALL FUNCTION 'ZF1'.
7 ENDMETHOO.
8 ENDCLASS.
The class zcl_demo_class isiin a’software component with the language version set to "ABAP Cloud".
The function module ZF1'is in a different software component with the language version set to
"Standard ABAP". Both the class and function module are customer created.
Regarding line #6, which of the following are valid statements?
A: A. ZF1'can be called only if it is released for cloud development.
B: B. 'ZF1'can be called if a wrapper is created for it and the wrapper itself is released for cloud development.
C: C. "ZF1" can be called whether it is released or not for cloud development
D: D. ZF1"can be called if a wrapper is created for it but the wrapper itself is not released for cloud development.

QuestionText:
Given the following Core Data Services View Entity Data Definition,
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
DEFINE VIEW ENTITY demo_cds_data_source_matrix
AS SELECT FROM
<source>
{
    KEY field_1,
        field_2,
        field_3
}
Which of the following types are permitted to be used for <source> on line #4? 
Note: There are 2
correct answers to this question.
A: A. Anexternal view from the ABAP Dictionary
B: B. A database view from the ABAP Dictionary
D: D. A databased table from the ABAP dictionary

QuestionText:
Which restrictions exist for ABAP SQL arithmetic' expressions? 
Note: There are 2 correct answers to
this question.
A: The operator is allowed only-in floating point expressions.
B: The operator/is allowed only in floating point expressions.
C: Decimal types and intéger types can NOT be used in the same expression.
D: Floating point types and integer types can NOT be used in the same expression.

QuestionText:
When does SAP recommend to use a sorted or a hashed table respectively? Note: There are 2
correct answers to this question.
A: A. A hashed table, when you read a single record and specify the complete key.
B: B. A sorted table, when you read a single record and specify non key fields.
C: C. A hashed table, when you read a subset in a loop and specify a part of the key from the left without gaps.
D: D. A sorted table, when you read a subset in a loop and specify a part of the key from the left

QuestionText:
Which type of legacy code does SAP recommend you eliminate when you review modifications as
part of an SAP S/4HANA system conversion? 
Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: A. Code that can be redesigned as a key user extension
B: B. Code that supports a critical business process
C: C. Code that now is identical to a standard SAP object
D: D. Code that has less than 10% usage according to usage statistics

QuestionText:
When processing a loop with the statement DO... ENDDO, what system variable contains the implicit
loop counter?

Which of the following actions cause an indirect change to a database table requiring a table
conversion? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: A. Changing the field labels of a data element that is used in the table definition.
B: B. Shortening the length of a domain used in a data element that is used in the table definition.
C: C. Renaming a field in a structure that is included in the table definition
D: D. Deleting a field from a structure that is included in the table definition.

QuestionText:
Class super has subclass sub. Which rules are valid for the sub constructor? 
Note: There are 2 correct
answers to this question.
A: A. Import parameters can only be evaluated after calling the constructor of super.
B: B. The constructor of super must be called before using any components of your own instance.
C: C. The method signature can be changed.
D: D. Events of your own instance cannot be raised before the registration of a handler in super.

Which of the following string functions are predicate functions? 
Note: There are 2 correct answers
to this question.

In RESTful Application Programming, a business object contains which parts? Note: There are 2
correct answers to this question:

You have a superclass superl and a subclass/subd'of super1. Each class has an instance constructor
and a static constructor. The first statement of your program creates an instance of sub1. In which
sequence will the constructors be executed?
A. Class constructor of superl.
B. Instance constructor of'sub1.
C. Instance constructor of superl
D. Class constructonof subl.
What are some properties of database tables? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: A. They can have any number of key fields.
B: B. They store information in two dimensions.
C: C. They may have key fields.
D: D. They can have relationships to other tables.

QuestionText:
In this nested join below
SELECT FROM t_a AS a
    LEFT OUTER JOIN t_b AS b
    LEFT OUTER JOIN t_c AS c
    ON c~f1 = b~f1 AND c~f2 = b~f2
    ON b~f1 = a~f1
WHERE ...

in which way is the join evaluated?
A. From the left to the right in the order of the tables:
1. a is joined with b
2. b is joined with ¢

B. From the top to the bottom in the order of the on  conditions
1. b is joined with c
2. a is joined with b

C. From the bottom to the top in the order of the on conditions:
1. a is joined with b
2. b is joined with ¢

D. From the right to the left in the order of the tables:
1. b is joined with c.
2. b is joined with a.

Given the following Core Data Services View Entity Data Definition:
1 @AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT REQUIRED
2 DEFINE VIEN ENTITY demo_rds_assoc_element
3 AS SELECT FROM scarr            
4 ASSOCIATION OF ONE TO MANY demo_cds_assoc_spfli AS _spfli
5 ON scarr.carrid = spfli.carrid
6  {
7   KEY carrid,
8  ?        
9  carrname
10  }
The "demo_ods_assoc_spfi data source referenced in line #4 contains a field "connid" which you
would like to expose in the element list.Which of the following statements would do this if inserted
on line #8?

As a consultant you are posed the following question from a client who is using SAP S/4HANA Cloud,
public edition and also SAP BTP, ABAP environment.

"We are currently using an SAP Fiori app based on SAP Fiori elements that analyzes open orders. We
have determined that it should be extended via a new button on the Ul which will perform an onthe-
fly calculation and display the result in a quick popup for the enduser. We have been informed
by SAP that all underlying stack layers for the SAP Fiori app have been extensibility enabled."

Based on this which of the following extension types would you recommend to the customer to add
the new button?

Given the following ABAP SQL statement excerpt from an ABAP program:
1 Select single * 
2 from spfli
3 Where Carrid = 'LH' and Connid = "0400"
4 into @data(wa).

You are given the following information:
1. The data source "spfli" on line #2 is an SAP HANA database table
2. "spfli" will be a large table with over one million rows.
3. This program is the only one in the system that accesses the table.
4. This program will run rarely.

Based on this information, which of the following general settings should you set for the spfli
database table? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.

What are some characteristics of secondary keys for internal tables? Note: There are 3 correct
answers to this question.
A: Multiple secondary keys are allowed for any kind of internal table.
B: Secondary keys can only be created for standard tables.
C: Secondary keys must be chosen explicitly when you actually read from an internal table.
D: Hashed secondary keys do NOT have to be unique.
E: Sorted secondary keys do NOT have to be unique.

QuestionText:
Give the following Core Data Service view entity data definition
1 @AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT REQUIRED
2 DEFINE VIEW ENTITY demo_cds_param_view_entity

6 sflight

8 KEY carrid,

10 KEY fldate,
11 price,
12 seatsmax,
13 seatsoct
14 }
15 WHERE fldate > p_date;
Which of the following ABAP SQL snippets are syntactically correct ways to provide a value for the
parameter on line #4? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question

You have the following CDS definition:
define view entity Z_ENTITY as select from Z_SOURCE1 as Source1
association to Z_SOURCE2 as _Source2

???

{
  key carrier_id as Carrier,
  key connection_id as Connection,
  cityfrom as DepartureCity,
  cityto as ArrivalCity,
}

_Source2
Which of the following ON conditions must you insert in place of "???"?

You have two internal tables itab1 and itab2.What is true for using the expression itab1 =
corresponding #( itab2 )? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
A: A. Fields with the same name and the same type will be copied from itab2 to itab 1.
B: B. itab1 and itab2 must have at least one field name in common.
C: C. itab1 and itab2 must have the same data type.
D: D. Fields with the same name but with different types may be copied from itab2 to itab1.

QuestionText:
What would be the correct expression to change a given string value 'mr joe doe' into 'JOE' in an
ABAP SQL field list?

A. SELECT FROM TABLE dbtab1
FIELDS
f1,
substring(upper('mjore doe'), 4, 3) AS f2_sub_up,
f3,...

B. SELECT FROM TABLE dbtabl
FIELDS
f1,
upper(left('mr joe doe', 6)) AS f2_up_left,
f3,

C. SELECT FROM TABLE dbtab1
FIELDS
f1,
substring(lower(upper( 'mr joe doe') ), 4, 3) AS f2__sub_lo_up,
f3,

D. SELECT FROM TABLE dbtabl
FIELDS
f1,
left(lower(substring( 'mr joe doe', 4,3)), 3) AS f2_left_lo_sub,
f3,

For the assignment,
gv_target=gv_source.
which of the following data declarations will always work without truncation or rounding? Note:
There are 2 correct answers to this question.

A. DATA gv_source TYPE p LENGTH 8 DECIMALS 3.
to
DATA gv_target TYPE p LENGTH 16 DECIMALS 2.

B. DATA gv_source TYPE d.
to
DATA gv_target TYPE string.

C. DATA gv_source TYPE c.
to
DATA gv_target TYPE string.

D. DATA gv_source TYPE string.
to
DATA gv_target TYPE c.

Given the following Core Data Service View Entity Data Definition,
1 @AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT REQUIRED
2 DEFINE VIEW ENTITY demo_flight info_union AS
3 SELECT FROM Scustom.
{
5 KEY id,
6 KEY ‘Customer AS partner,
7 name,
8 city,
9 country
10 }
1 UNION
12 SELECT FROM stravelag
13 {
1 KEY agencynum As id,
15 ‘Agency 'As partner,
16 name,
18  city,
19 country,
20 }
when you attempt to activate the definition, what will be the response?
A: A. Activation error because the field names of the union do not match
C: C. Activation error because the field types of the union do not match
D: D. Activation error because the key fields of the union do not match

QuestionText:
Given the following Core Data Service View Entity Data Definition:
1 @AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT REQUIRED
2 DEFINE VIEW ENTITY demo_sales_cds_so_ui_ve
3 AS SELECT FROM demo_sales_cds_so_ve AS SalesOrder
4 ASSOCIATION TO PARENT demo_sales_cds_so_ve AS SalesOrder
5 ON Sprojection.parent_key = SalesOrder.so_key
6 COMPOSITION [0..*] TO demo_sales_cds_material_ve AS ScheduleLine
7 ON Sprojection.material = ScheduleLine.material
8 ASSOCIATION [0..1] TO demo_sales_cds_material_ve AS Material
9 ON Sprojection.material = Material.material
10 {
11 KEY so_item_key,
12 parent_key,
13 posnr,
14 SalesOrder,
15 ScheduleLine,
16 Material as mat
17 }
18

In the following ABAP SQL code, what are valid case distinctions? Note: There are 2 correct answers
to this question.

A. SELECT FROM dbtab1
FIELDS F1,
CASE
WHEN F2 ="1' THEN 'Value 1
WHEN f2'2' THEN 'Value 2' ELSE "Value for the rest’
END AS f case
INTO TABLE @et_t1.

B. SELECT FROM dbtab1
FIELDS F1,
CASE
WHEN F2="1" THEN "Value 1'
WHEN f2 < f3 AND f2 = ‘2’ THEN "Value2'
WHEN OTHERS 'Value for the rest"
ENDCASE AS f_case
INTO TABLE @gt_t1.

C. SELECTFROM dbtab1
FIELDS f1,
CASE f2
WHEN ‘1" THEN 'Value;1*
WHEN '2' THEN ‘Value 2'
ELSE "Value for the'rest'
END ASf_case
INTO TABLE @gt_t1.

D. SELECT FROM dbtabl
FIELDS F1,
CASE f2,
WHEN ‘1’ THEN 'Value 1',
WHEN 2’ THEN 'Value 2',
WHEN OTHERS "Value for the rest",
ENDCASE AS f_case
INTO TABLE @gt_t1.
